title: MMR
body: Where do i go to look up my mmr?

replies.body: Best way is to check what ranks you're being matched with and how much LP you're gaining/losing. If you gain 25 and lose 10, you've got a good MMR. You won't get a number out of this of course, just an idea of whether or not your current MMR is above or below where you should be. oce.op.gg and lolking.com aren't very accurate, I seriously don't trust them one bit xD

You can check 
oce.op.gg
Or Lolking.com
BUT these are rough estimates of your MMR not 100%

hope this helps

This. The estimates given by any source are usually just based on the rank of the people you get matched with so it's not going to give you correct, specific values but it'll give you an idea where you sit.
